title: 1v1.LOL
description: A fast-paced third-person shooter and builder, similar in mechanics to competitive building games. Battle against other players in 1v1 duels or team modes while constructing defensive structures on the fly. Features quick-paced combat that combines shooting skills with strategic building.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and mouse to aim and shoot. Press Q, F, C, V to select different building pieces (walls, floors, stairs, etc.) and left-click to place them. Right-click to edit structures. Master both combat and quick building to outplay your opponents in intense duels.
